channel.title: [pi] help
channel.description:
Ok, i cant find where to change the name of the bank when it says "The Bank of W.e" now where can i change that, and ive looked through all the files and cannot find it. Also how do i change the logout message. Thanks
If i can get this fixed ill rep who ever gives me the right answer

item.title: [pi] help
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

[quote=“Mr…x…, post:7, topic:365752”]Uhm? Omg
Lmaoo

Go to textHandler.java

Then just search “Bank of runescape” (or what ever it says)
and change it to the one you want…
Note there may be more then one so change em all.[/quote]

my ass almost fell off i laughed so hard at this… epic

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] help
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

Have you tried looking in RSinterfaces.java inside the client files? As I’m on my iPod, I cannot check it atm, but that is where I went to change my quest tab interface.

item.title: [pi] help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Hmm, interesting problem you have here. I tried looking through the Project Insanity source that I have, I couldn’t find anything related about the bank text. You can scan through this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

It gives an idea on how to change text, apparently these things would be located in the playerAssistant.java file. I’ll keep looking though. I’ve seen this problem on other servers where certain text can not be changed.

Read full topic
